=== Progress from last month ===

Wont list it all, but some highlights:

* Abused Dmedia ingest at <nowiki>[[http://www.youtube.com/user/LinaroOrg/feed|Linaro Connect]]</nowiki> - used a laptop, and when a file-store is on the same HDD as your Dmedia CouchDB databases, must say that CouchDB calling fsync twice a second sucks a lot of performance away
* novacut 933802: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/novacut/+bug/933802|Proper thumbnail generation for Storyboard View]]</nowiki>
* Landed big improvements in the <nowiki>[[http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~novacut/userwebkit/trunk/view/head:/ui/couch.js#L482|couch.Session]]</nowiki> !JavaScript - for example, we can now correctly handly new-document creation when doing real-time collaboration
* <nowiki>[[http://blog.novacut.com/2012/02/announcing-novacut-1202-components.html|Released the 12.02 components]]</nowiki>
* Here are the <nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/114471118004229223857/posts/Y1JXKndFYaf|geeky instructions on using our random-test-edit generator]]</nowiki>, which both <nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/106813729925681106144/posts/Poyvto1m6h9|Josh Melling]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/117657957994195225607/posts/KudwMurxpL2|Paulo Morais]]</nowiki> managed to get working. Thanks, guys!
* Thanks to a review from <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~broder|Evan Broder]]</nowiki>, seems like <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/couchdb/+bug/903098|CouchDB 1.1.1 will indeed be in Precise]]</nowiki> - er, spoke too soon, <nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/114471118004229223857/posts/KHMP2fDuWVM|there are still issues]]</nowiki>
